meanings: (쓰레기 등을) throw away, throw out, dump, (informal) junk
(포기하다, 떠나다) desert, leave, abandon, (literary) forsake, give up
가망이 없는데도 cling to the hope (that)

vlive.korean: [미련을 버리지 못한 왕 포도 화백] 이거까지 다 붙여야 돼요? [Just making sure] Do I have to fill these in too? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.1
vlive.english: [Just making sure] Do I have to fill these in too?

vlive.korean: 버리지 않을까요? Won't I throw this away? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 성인이 된 따나🌹 성산^_^♡
버리지 마 살려줘! Don't leave me. Save me. 듣기 View video 핵인싸 동맹 (HACKINSSA CREW) : [핵인싸동맹] EP.18 방송최초! 게임하다 토하는 연예인 ㄹㅇ약 빨고 하는 방송

examples.korean: I hope you haven't used all the milk. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 네가 그 우유를 다 써 버리지 않았기를 바래. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I hope you haven't used all the milk. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Don’t throw that away—it might come in handy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그거 버리지 마. 쓸모가 있을지도 몰라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Don’t throw that away—it might come in handy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was drilled into us at an early age never to drop litter. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 어린 나이 때 절대 쓰레기를 버리지 말라는 것을 주입받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was drilled into us at an early age never to drop litter. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She’s tried to give up smoking but just can’t kick the habit. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 담배를 끊으려고 애를 써 왔지만 그저 그 습성을 버리지를 못한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She’s tried to give up smoking but just can’t kick the habit. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She was careful not to close the door on the possibility of further talks. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 추가 회담의 가능성을 없애 버리지 않도록 조심했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was careful not to close the door on the possibility of further talks. Add to Wordbook
